items.question: How do "competencies" differ from tags/topics?
items.answer: Tags describe “what it’s about”; competencies describe “what you can do” after learning. This works better for recommendations, trajectories, and skill analytics.

items.question: Can different types of content be labeled (videos/articles/events)?
items.answer: Yes: videos, articles, webinars, offline events, and more. The key requirement is descriptive metadata (title, description, outline).

items.question: Can I get a sample labeling before the pilot?
items.answer: Yes. Send 5–10 items — we’ll prepare a sample so you can evaluate quality before a pilot.
